name: Gun Raiders
summary: Gun Raiders is a free-to-play VR shooter!  Now with Battle Royale!  Chat with friends while you mow down your enemies in multiple game modes using a choice selection of weapons while flying through the air with your jetpack or climbing monkey-style from wall to wall!  Race to the top of the leaderboards while customizing yourself with all the crazy skins available.  Updated weekly.  New maps and game modes drop monthly.  In-game store and battle pass coming soon. Join our Discord for tournaments and more!
